summary: Premium Amazon Growth Consultant landing page for Mayur Sahu / ProSellers targeting USA & UK brands. Expanded from 7 to 12+ sections with major upgrades: updated Hero with dual CTAs and trust badges, new Problem Section (pain points), expanded Services (4 categories), 3-tier Pricing, Case Studies with animated charts, Testimonials, enhanced About/Founder, updated Why Choose Us, and enhanced Strategy Call with WhatsApp + email form. Premium visual upgrades include scroll animations, Recharts data visualizations, glassmorphism cards, gold shimmer effects, Lucide icons, parallax hero, and animated counters. Same dark blue/gold theme (#0A0F1E + #C9A84C).
architectural_notes: Dark blue/black theme with gold or white text, minimal layout with lots of whitespace
Premium consultant aesthetic â€” avoid crowded layout, cheap icons, or too many colors
Calendly integration to be added later to the Strategy Call section
Recharts library used for animated Before/After charts in Case Studies section
Scroll-triggered animations implemented via Intersection Observer or similar for fade/slide-in effects
Company/brand name is 'ProSellers' â€” use in navigation logo, footer, and all branded references

existing_features.title: Build a single-page React frontend with 7 sections in this order: Hero, Positioning, Services, Pricing, About, Strategy Call CTA, and Why Choose. Use a sticky top navigation bar with the consultant name/logo and a 'Book Call' CTA link that scrolls to the Strategy Call section. All sections must be full-width with generous vertical padding and a consistent dark blue/near-black background (#0A0F1E or similar).

Implement the Hero section (Section 1) with: a large bold headline 'Premium Amazon Growth Consultant for USA & UK Brands', a subheadline 'Helping serious Amazon sellers scale profitably with data-driven strategy, advanced PPC optimization and brand-focused growth.', a gold-styled CTA button labeled 'Book Free Strategy Call' that scrolls to the Strategy Call section, and small muted text below the button reading 'Limited Clients Accepted Each Month'. Center-align all content with a subtle background gradient or texture to add depth.

Implement the Positioning section (Section 2) with headline 'This Is For Serious Sellers Only', followed by text 'We work with a limited number of Amazon sellers who are ready to scale and optimize profit.', then four bullet points: 'Doing $5kâ€“$100k/month', 'Private label brands', 'USA & UK sellers', 'Ready to scale seriously'. Use gold accent bullet icons or checkmarks. Layout should feel exclusive and premium â€” not a generic feature list.

Implement the Services section (Section 3) with exactly three service groups displayed as cards or clean columns. Group 1 â€” 'Amazon Growth & Profit Optimization': Full account growth strategy, PPC scaling & ACOS reduction, Conversion optimization, Listing performance improvement. Group 2 â€” 'Brand Scaling': Product launch strategy, Brand positioning, A+ content direction, Storefront optimization. Group 3 â€” 'Advanced Support': Account suspension guidance, FBA planning, eBay expansion. Do NOT add extra services or icons beyond subtle gold accent lines/dividers.

Implement the Pricing section (Section 4) with a single centered pricing card titled 'Consulting Retainer', price display 'Starting from $500/month', supporting text 'Final pricing depends on account size and goals. Minimum 3-month commitment. We work with limited brands to maintain high performance.', and a gold CTA button labeled 'Request Consultation' that scrolls to the Strategy Call section. The card should feel premium â€” use gold border, ample padding, and white/gold typography.

Implement the About section (Section 5) with a two-column layout: left column shows the generated professional headshot image (mayur-sahu-headshot.dim_400x500.png from frontend/public/assets/generated/), right column shows name 'Mayur Sahu', title 'Amazon & Ecommerce Growth Consultant', and five credential lines: '12+ years ecommerce experience', 'Working with international sellers', 'Specialized in Amazon USA & UK', 'Data-driven scaling strategies', 'Direct expert support. No outsourcing.' On mobile, stack image above text.

Implement the Strategy Call section (Section 6) â€” the most visually prominent section â€” with headline 'Book Your Free Amazon Growth Strategy Call', supporting text 'Get account audit, growth roadmap and profit improvement insights.', and a large gold CTA button labeled 'Schedule Call Now'. Include a Calendly placeholder: render a bordered placeholder box with text 'Calendly scheduling widget will appear here' styled to match the dark theme. This section should use a slightly lighter dark background or a gold accent border to draw attention.

Implement the Why Choose section (Section 7) with five trust/differentiator bullet points: 'Work directly with expert', 'Lower cost than US agencies', 'Limited clients = full focus', 'Confidential & secure', 'Long-term growth partner'. Display as a clean horizontal row of cards or a centered vertical list with gold checkmark icons. Section should feel like a trust-builder close to the page footer.
Add a minimal footer with the name 'Mayur Sahu â€” Amazon Growth Consultant' and copyright notice. Keep it dark and understated â€” one line of small white/muted text centered.

Apply a consistent premium design system across the entire page: primary background #0A0F1E (near-black dark blue), gold accent color #C9A84C for buttons, borders, and bullet icons, white (#FFFFFF) for primary text, light gray (#A0A8B8) for subtext. Use a professional serif or elegant sans-serif Google Font for headings (e.g., Playfair Display or Cormorant Garamond) and a clean sans-serif for body text. Ensure generous whitespace, no crowded layouts, and no decorative clip-art icons.

Update the Hero section with the new headline 'We Help USA & UK Amazon Sellers Scale Profitably Without Hiring Expensive Agencies.', dual CTA buttons ('Book Free Strategy Call' and 'Get Free Account Audit' â€” both scrolling to the Strategy Call section), and three animated trust badge counters below the buttons: 'Limited Client Slots', '12+ Years Experience', 'Serving Global Sellers'. Add a subtle particle/floating-dot animated background and a parallax scroll effect on the hero background layer. Apply a gold shimmer/pulse animation on both CTA buttons.

Add a new Problem Section immediately after the Hero section with the headline 'Struggling With These?' and six pain-point items displayed as a responsive grid of cards: 'High ACOS?', 'Account Suspension?', 'No Ranking?', 'Poor Conversion?', 'FBA Issues?', 'Sales Stuck?'. Each card should use a gold accent icon (Lucide React), glassmorphism card styling with a gold glow border, and a scroll-triggered fade-in animation. The section background should be the standard #0A0F1E dark navy.

Replace the existing ServicesSection with an expanded version containing four service category cards: (1) 'Amazon Growth & Management' â€” Full account management, PPC management, Listing optimization, FBA setup; (2) 'Brand Development' â€” Brand registry, A+ content strategy, Storefront design, Product launch strategy; (3) 'Emergency Services' â€” Account reinstatement, ASIN suppression fix, Listing hijacking support; (4) 'eBay Management' â€” Account setup, Listing optimization, PPC management. Each card should use a gold-accented numbered header, gold Lucide icon, and glassmorphism card styling. Apply staggered scroll-triggered slide-up entrance animations.

Replace the existing PricingSection with a 3-tier pricing layout displaying three cards: 'Starter' ($499/month), 'Growth' ($999/month, marked as 'Most Popular' with a prominent gold badge), and 'Elite' ($1,999/month). Below the cards add the text 'Custom plans available for 7-figure brands.' and two scarcity lines: 'Minimum 3-month commitment' and 'Limited onboarding slots available'. The 'Growth' card should be visually elevated (larger, gold border glow). All cards use glassmorphism styling. Each card includes a gold CTA button that scrolls to the Strategy Call section.

Add a new Case Studies section after the Pricing section. Display three sample case study cards with Before â†’ After data using animated Recharts bar charts. Sample data: (1) Client A â€” ACOS reduced from 45% to 18%, Revenue grew from $12k/mo to $38k/mo; (2) Client B â€” Conversion rate improved from 8% to 19%, Revenue grew from $8k/mo to $24k/mo; (3) Client C â€” PPC spend reduced 35%, Revenue grew from $20k/mo to $61k/mo. Include animated number counter reveals (count-up on scroll) for the key metrics. Use the dark gold theme with glassmorphism cards.

Add a new Testimonials section after the Case Studies section. Display five sample testimonials as a responsive card grid. Each testimonial includes a client name, country flag emoji (USA ðŸ‡ºðŸ‡¸ or UK ðŸ‡¬ðŸ‡§), a short review quote (2â€“3 sentences about Amazon growth results), a 5-star gold star rating, and a subtle gold border card. Use scroll-triggered staggered card entrance animations. Sample testimonial names and content should sound realistic (e.g., 'James R. ðŸ‡ºðŸ‡¸ â€” Mayur helped us cut ACOS from 52% to 21% in just 60 days...').

Update the existing About/Founder section to use the 'Meet The Founder' heading, display Mayur Sahu's name and title 'Amazon & Ecommerce Growth Consultant', and include the following credential lines with gold checkmark icons: '12+ years ecommerce experience', 'India + international market exposure', 'Amazon USA & UK specialist', 'Data-driven scaling strategy approach', 'Direct expert support â€” no outsourcing'. Retain the existing headshot image (mayur-sahu-headshot.dim_400x500.png) in the left column with gold corner accents. Add a scroll-triggered slide-in animation for both columns.

Update the existing Why Choose section with updated differentiator content: 'Work directly with the expert (no junior managers)', 'Lower cost than US agencies â€” save up to 60%', 'Limited client slots = 100% focused attention', 'Performance-driven approach with data transparency', 'Long-term growth partner'. Display as a horizontal row of glassmorphism cards with gold Lucide icons. Add scroll-triggered staggered card entrance animations.

Update the existing Strategy Call section to include: the headline 'Book Your Free 30-Minute Amazon Growth Strategy Call', supporting text 'Get a full account audit, growth roadmap, and profit improvement insights â€” at zero cost.', a large gold 'Schedule Call Now' button (scroll-to-Calendly), a WhatsApp CTA button (green styling, Lucide MessageCircle icon, label 'Chat on WhatsApp', href 'https://wa.me/' as placeholder), and a simple email contact form with fields: Name, Email, Amazon Store URL, and a 'Send Message' submit button. Retain the Calendly placeholder box. The section should use a slightly lighter background (#0D1526) or a gold accent top border to visually stand out.

Update the Navigation bar to include links to all new sections: Home, About, Services, Pricing, Case Studies, Testimonials, Book Call. Ensure all nav links smooth-scroll to the correct section IDs. Update the mobile hamburger menu to include the new section links. Keep the sticky dark styling and 'Book Call' gold CTA button.

Apply global premium animation and visual polish across the entire page: (1) Implement scroll-triggered fade-in and slide-up animations for all sections using IntersectionObserver or a CSS animation approach; (2) Add staggered entrance animations for cards and bullet lists; (3) Apply a gold shimmer/pulse keyframe animation on all primary gold CTA buttons; (4) Add subtle hover micro-animations on all cards (scale up slightly, increase gold glow intensity); (5) Add an animated visual pathway or step-connector element between the Problem â†’ Services â†’ Pricing â†’ Strategy Call sections to visually guide users down the page; (6) All glassmorphism cards should use backdrop-blur with a semi-transparent dark background and a subtle gold border.

Replace all instances of the consultant brand name with 'ProSellers' across the entire landing page. Update the Navigation bar logo/brand text to 'ProSellers', update the Footer to read 'ProSellers â€” Amazon Growth Consultant', update the HTML page title in index.html to 'ProSellers | Amazon Growth Consultant', and update any other location where the brand/company name appears as a standalone label (e.g., section headings, meta tags, or branded taglines). The consultant's personal name 'Mayur Sahu' should remain unchanged wherever it appears as a person's name (About section, credentials, testimonial references).

new_feature_requests.summary: Hero section with headline, subtext, CTA button and limited clients note
Positioning section targeting serious sellers ($5k-$100k/month, private label, USA & UK)
Services section with 3 groups: Growth & Profit Optimization, Brand Scaling, Advanced Support
Pricing section: Consulting Retainer from $500/month, 3-month minimum, Request Consultation CTA
About section for Mayur Sahu with photo placeholder and professional credentials
Strategy Call section with Calendly integration placeholder and Schedule Call CTA
Why Choose section with 5 trust/differentiator bullet points
Updated Hero: new headline, dual CTAs (Book Free Strategy Call + Get Free Account Audit), trust badges (Limited Client Slots, 12+ Years Experience, Serving Global Sellers)
Problem Section: 'Struggling With These?' with 6 pain points (High ACOS, suspension, no ranking, poor conversion, FBA issues, sales stuck)
Expanded Services into 4 categories: Amazon Growth & Management, Brand Development, Emergency Services, eBay Management
3-tier Pricing: Starter / Growth (Most Popular) / Elite with placeholder pricing, custom plans note for 7-figure brands, and scarcity messaging
Case Studies section: sample Before â†’ After data with animated Recharts bar/line charts and number counter animations
Testimonials section: 3-5 sample testimonials with client name and country flag (USA/UK)
Premium visual upgrades: scroll-triggered animations, parallax hero, gold shimmer on CTAs, glassmorphism cards, Lucide icons, animated counters, connecting pathway between sections
Enhanced Strategy Call section with WhatsApp button and email form alongside Calendly placeholder
